name: FS22_Coles_County
description:
Welcome To Coles County Illinois. This is Real Location In Central Illinois but sell points and farm are fictional. This is a 2x Map Pc Only 

Version 1.0

- A corn Dryer is inbuilt in the map produces dry corn from corn, Need to Buy it first to work.

- Custom Silo built in map produces silage from grass/chaff, Need to Buy it first to work.

- Map has 13 arable lands, ranging from medium to large.

- Grain bins added and NEED AUGERS to dump in grains.

- 1 custom farm area on the map with 1 dairy barns and 1 pigsty.

- Added Anhydrous Ammonia as a new fertilizer type.

- Farm have water and fuel triggers. I left out the house trigger so players can add their own triggers. 

- 5 sell points are included and vary for each product.

- There is a  Sloans Dealership, a bulk feed shop for buying seeds, lime, herbicide, fertilizer, anhydrous, and propane.  

- just a few small warnings that are harmless. 

Any donations  small are always very much appreciated & this would be an extra motivation for me to bring better maps to FS 22.

If you like my work please share. Thank you!

Note: I do not take complete credits for the models/objects as a few of them are from Fs19 maps where I did convert to FS22, make changes to models and textures.

Credits:

Map Models & objects: Giants Software, DJ Modding, Louisiana Mapping.

- I apologize if there are objects on the map that are not credited properly. Please drop me a message so that I can update credits. I would always credit people's work properly.

- I would always be grateful to DJ Modding for helping me with my map, scripts, and much more when needed.

I would like to thank you for your time. Hopefully, you will enjoy playing this map as I do. Please report to my FB page for any issues.
